dialog: State your name for the record.

if there was a reason for committing this crime ...

each one requiring a different code changed every 12 hours.

and the most elaborate vault door ever conceived.

between $60 and $70 million in cash and coin.

in two weeks, the night we're robbing it ...

down the elevator we can't move ...
past the guards with the guns, into the vault we can't open ...

we're just supposed to walk out of there with $150 million ...

the guy who's screwing your wife.
